thread.section_title: The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful stay, Incredible Service
thread.title_full: Wonderful stay, Incredible Service - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: regulartraveller56
title: Wonderful stay, Incredible Service
text:
My wife and I stayed at The Royal park hotel for 2 nights in March 2017.
1. The hotel is very well located, right next to Hyde Park Corner and a 3 minute walk from Paddington Station
2. We were looked after really well by the entire staff of the hotel. A special mention for Mathilda who went beyond the call of duty and even found out theatre timings for us.
3. The room was outstanding and very clean.
4. The hotel has excellent parking facilities right outside the hotel.
We will definitely come again and again to this lovely hotel.
